entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
